title: Samsung chairman named as suspect in tax probe
text:
Samsung chairman named as suspect in tax probe Thursday, February 08, 2018 - 01:27 
Barely days after his son's release from jail, Samsung Chairman Lee Kun-hee has been named a suspect in a $7.5 million dollar tax evasion case, bringing Samsung scandals back into the limelight. Sareena Dayaram reports. ▲ Hide Transcript ▶ View Transcript 
Barely days after his son's release from jail, Samsung Chairman Lee Kun-hee has been named a suspect in a $7.5 million dollar tax evasion case, bringing Samsung scandals back into the limelight.
